chunk_text:
# RESTORATION 
# FROM THE GROUND UP
###### Restoration  
from the ground up. Our vineyard is more than just another winery, it's a piece of history. Once home to the 18th governor of Oregon and a beautiful farm in its own right. What started as a homestead in the 1800s turned into a large family farm stretching over 300 acres. The 1886 farmhouse still stands next to our tasting room today.
